text: Gordon Edward Pinsent, CC, FRSC (July 12, 1930 - February 25, 2023) was a Canadian actor, screenwriter, director and playwright. He was known for his roles in numerous productions, including Away from Her, The Rowdyman, John and the Missus, A Gift to Last, Due South, The Red Green Show and Quentin Durgens, M.P. He was the voice of Babar the elephant in television and film from 1989 to early 2015. Pinsent died in his sleep on February 25, 2023, at age 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Northern Stars: Gordon Pinsent Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Order of Canada Category:Actors from Toronto Category:People from Newfoundland and Labrador Category:Canadian playwrights
title: Gordon Pinsent
